Refers to the _schema.MetaData collection that will be used for new _schema.Table objects.

orm_declarative_metadata

registry: ClassVar[_RegistryType] = <sqlalchemy.orm.decl_api.registry object>

Refers to the _orm.registry in use where new _orm.Mapper objects will be associated.

async_chat.server.response_handler module

Модуль реализующий класс обработки запросов пользователей

На вход основного метода processing_request принимает запрос от пользователя, ответ записывает в очередь сообщений пользователя

class async_chat.server.response_handler.ResponseHandler(current_client: Client, clients: Clients)

Базовые классы: object

dispatch_request(incomming_data: dict[str, Any]) → Response
static get_message_dto(schema: Type[T], data: dict[str, Any]) → MessageDto
get_message_model(schema: Type[T], data: dict[str, Any]) → T
processing_add_contact(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User) → Response
processing_delete_contact(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User) → Response
processing_get_contacts(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User) → Response
processing_join_room(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User) → Response
processing_leave_room(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User) → Response
processing_login_user(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User | None) → Response
processing_logout_user(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User | None) → Response
processing_message(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User) → None
processing_presence(data: dict[str, Any], current_user: User) → None

class async_chat.server.server.ServerSocket(family=-1, type=-1, proto=-1, fileno=None)

Базовые классы: socket

bind(address)

Bind the socket to a local address. For IP sockets, the address is a pair (host, port); the host must refer to the local host. For raw packet sockets the address is a tuple (ifname, proto [,pkttype [,hatype [,addr]]])

port
